type2_incorrect.reasoning: User.createdAt set to empty string instead of ISO timestamp as specified in User interface
Timestamps use .toString() instead of .toISOString() format. Spec requires ISO timestamps for Task.createdAt, Task.updatedAt, and Session.expiresAt
Login endpoint returns error code 'MISSING_CREDENTIALS' but spec defines 'MISSING_FIELDS' for required fields missing
Frontend extracts data.error instead of data.error.message from error response. Spec defines error format as { error: { code, message } }
Login page lacks explicit client-side email validation using regex pattern. Only uses HTML5 validation while registration page shows the required explicit validation pattern
Dashboard displays hardcoded mock user data instead of fetching actual user information. Comment says 'Mock user data for now'
